name: Space Prevention Force
description:
Space Prevention Force is a tycoon and management game where you build, research, and market your company to save alien lives. Along the way there will be upgrades, new buildings, and obstacles that you most overcome. Choose your commander and difficulty, and reach 1000 alien lives saved as fast as possible!

CONTROLS:

WSAD - Camera
Scroll Wheel - Zoom
Q - Building
E - Worker
Z - Research
X - Marketing
C - Speaking
Time - Top Right Buttons
Left Click - Workers / Leechers
T - Screenshot

Devlogs of the game on Youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC9jO_8PiZNkNmGjR0mbBeA?view_as=subscriber

Made With:
Unity 2019
Photoshop
After Effects
C#
